content.detailedDescription:
It's approximate nov 2013
at night around 2 am
m hostel student
nov-dec engg exam time
friend want to smoke cigarette
so we came on tares
there is pure sky
so i take mobile camera blackberry pearl 9100 to capture mrig nakshatra(object near orion in sky seen from shahapur maharastra india)
when i focus cam on it its not capture it but something doted light observed
its not observed directly by eyes
first i thing it my cam problem 
but when i move cam then dot is not moving its stable in its own position
flashing color red blue and white(white quantity is more)
moving in small triangular position rapidly
i'm amazed,what the hell is that?
video not capture by my cam(object not seen in cam)
when cam in image mode then it observed
after 7-8 days i try to capture it but its not there. 
at that time i ignore it and my friend is not interested in that type of thing so i don't tell him.  
today i wipe out my pc data coz of disk full and i got that img.
if this information is useful then its ok,but i don't want to get involved in anything.
if not sorry for wasting your time.Don't make fun.
content.summary: Flashing light (white red blue),unknown shape,fast moving in triangular shape

content.detailedDescription: I was driving at night on highway 98 in gulf breeze, fl, going through naval live oaks, the national seashore. all of a sudden there was this ball in the sky in front of me, floating above the highway, just above tree height. it was big and solid but glowing like it's a small star and getting near it would burn you, and orange with like a hint of red in it. it hovered there for a minute or so, it was hard to keep track of time while this was going on. then it split into 4 balls of the same color and shape and shot into 4 equal directions, like from the corners of a square. they had small tails when they did this, but they were moving so crazy fast! they didn't go far from their start points and then at the same moment, they just vanished. i googled at the time to try and find a logical explination and all i found was lightning balls and i knew without a doubt that was not it. i watched your show and thought i should google it again and it was everywhere now! then in the episode about the texas sightings i decided to tell y'all. this is not my first experience. starting from the age of 2, strange occurrences have happened.
content.summary: A glowing orange/red ball hovered and then split into 4 of the same type but smaller, they shot in 4 equal directions and then just vanished.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving over the tasman bridge coming up over the high way i saw five bright orb lights and they became distant without really seeing that they became distant was really weird but they kinda just kept going up and up and disappear
content.summary: Driving home saw five lights hovering quick over the hill but they became distant so quick i called the police they had a look just brushed me off

content.detailedDescription:
I'm sorry i don't have a photo or video.  i've been debating on whether or not i'd even report this, but there have been a lot of odd things happening around me lately and i figured, what the heck...  

tuesday, june 9th, at dusk, i was sitting on my porch smoking a cigarette by myself.  i looked up and saw an object that i at first thought was a extremely high-up airplane flying toward me from the west.  i watched it and noticed that if it were a plane that high in the sky, it'd be going much faster than normal.  it was way above the clouds, reflecting what little remained of the sunlight.  i watched it pass overhead and noticed there were no lights, no wings or anything that would indicate it were a plane, and it was completely silent.   where we live, you can hear an airplane passing by for about 5 straight minutes, because it's so quiet and flat here and sound carries.  

anyway, as it was going by overhead, i thought to myself "it kind of looks like the north star or venus were flying through the sky right now."  it's the best way i could describe it.  and then it shifted soooo slightly to its left as it was headed east and was gone.  i strained to watch it go but it disappeared.

we get a lot of aircrafts over our house because we're near an airport and a military base, but i've never seen anything like this around here.  my mother suggested it was a drone?  but it was so high above the clouds, i would imagine it had to be as large as (if not larger than) an airplane.  in fact, after it had gone, an airplane did go by.  loud and low and lit up.

this actually reminded me of the first time i saw something weird like this, only that object had been larger, lower, and changed direction multiple times before zipping off faster than i could believe (that was in the year 2000 and i didn't know i could report that kind of stuff back then).  

what i saw has been sort of bothering me for a week now.  we've had one "confirmed" ufo sighting in this town in the last decade or so, so i was hesitant to report it.  been trying to explain it away.  but i trust my eyes, and my mind.  i'm damn smart, and very skeptical, and i know i saw something unusual last tuesday night.  i figure, maybe i wasn't the only one to see it and you'll have received (or will receive) similar reports about it.  

sorry if this is a waste of your time.  and thank you *for* your time.
content.summary: Appeared as though a large star or venus itself was flying across the sky silently.

content.detailedDescription: I had gone outside for a cigarette on friday june 12th of june, 2015. it was approximately 11:30 pm in burlington, ontario where we face south towards lake ontario. our house is up a couple of streets from the shoreline. it was just after i lit my cigarette when i thought i saw the moon in the general south east direction rise over and behind the treetops of my neighbours. but it wasn't the moon i saw, this was moving pretty fast. it was a orange-yellow round shape, that occasionally shimmered and pulsated. i happened to have my cell phone in my pocket, so i started to record the event as i started to dismiss any man-made aircraft that i knew about. no sound was emanating or trailing the object, this was quite silent. i tracked the object the best i could with my smart phone, and tried to zoom in the best i could a couple of times. i judged the distance over the lake directly se to s direction over lake ontario, moving at approximately the speed of a jet liner. it's course was a slowly ascending nature, and i lost it behind the treeline as it moved away from burlington and vectored to the general east hamilton area on the other side of the lake. i didn't have any feelings of fear, but rather stupefied as to what it could have been.
content.summary: I observed a large glowing sphere, pulsating with different colours, slowly ascend from above treetops to over the lake.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in a high school musical and around 11pm upon leaving the school my mother and i drove home. i goto a high school in downtown buffalo, but i live south of the city in west seneca, ny. as we got onto the nys 190 going south my mother and i noticed 6-7 glowing orbs to our right over the cities grain elevators. we thought them to be the plastic bags with candles that fly into the sky. they're typically used for latin american holidays, so my mother and i began to comb the sky for these floating orbs. we witnessed a few planes flying around, and due to our proximity to an international airport we were no strangers to airplanes flying around at night.
as we made our way down the thruway a plane that looked different was on the left. what drew our attention was the fact that the lights weren't flashing on the plane at all. a very uncommon thing for airplanes in our area. as we approached the object we noticed that it had stopped moving and was now just hovering in place. as it began to be directly on the side of our car we realized that the craft was a black triangle. the triangle was around the size and height of an incoming plane. the triangle then began to move southward and eventually exited our view due to obstructed view.
content.summary: Hovering black triangle witnessed on late night drive home.

content.detailedDescription: Wife and i were sitting in hot tub, on a clear night.  sky totally black.  we were watching fireflys go about.  then from the north, it looked the color of an ember from a fireplace and intensity, but traveling in straight line from n. to s. through raleigh airspace.  turned off the hot tub jets, and there was no sound.  i'm a private pilot, with many hours of night flying, and haven't witnessed anything that emitted light, unless it is a military jet with afterburners on.  but afterburners make a ton of noise and are mostly blue/white in color.  it was traveling at a speed that would be of standard commercial aircraft.  altitude estimate would be around 10,000 agl. we continued to watch it as it travelled behind a large tree but didn't see it emerge from the other side.  wife and i watched it for a full 2-3 minutes.  no other aircraft visible.  no other lights.  it seemed to have structure to it and not a true orb.  seemed to have solid edges and not a true ball.
content.summary: Orange firball with stucture with no flames.  looked like a fireplace ember -

content.detailedDescription:
My then girl friend and i used to visit the sea side town of ilfracombe, in devon uk a lot for our holidays. the year i've put would be an estimate gauged by my age at the time. could easily be two years either way. we went to the see front and there was a car park there near some cliffs. on this day, we noticed some people all looking out of the cove and looked to see what they were seeing. a hovering object was seen across the water. it was one of those things where it didn't seem at all like it would be a ufo (at the time, they had a public  disc shaped image and this was nothing like it). at first i thought it would be a hot air balloon. at the time, i had been forced to go plane spotting with my parents a few years in the past and they often had weird shapes in the 80s. the fact it hovered there backed this up. but there was no basket, just the shape. i still can't describe what it looks like to me. i've seen many ufo programs on tv and not really seen one of these. if anything it looks like a flying dustbin?
so we're looking at this object and watching, still many people looking and pointing at it. the people seeing it and pointing (ie their gaze at it) must have been around 50.
i took one photo of it in a point and click crappy 80s camera, so the picture i have is awful, not zoomed or anything, but it does show the object and its shape and that it is hovering over the water near the cliff.
i think i looked to my girl friend and was saying something to her and then look again and it was not there. again, kind of knocks out the hot air balloon thoughts.
as i was young, around 20, i think we just got on with our day and didn't think much more of it. showed parents the picture when developed and got the usual reaction of it must have been something else. 
anyway, in recent times i started to try and scan in some older photos and found the picture and it brought back the memories and as i saw a program that had mufon on it, i found your site and thought i'd mention it. i'd just really like some feedback and totally happy for someone to say what it really is. or if anyone has seen such a thing themselves.
not sure what you mean by film photo. this was a basic crappy camera. i can't recall its make or name. looked on ebay as i type and nearest thing is a kodak 400 compact 110 film camera. i have a load of negatives from that time, and i hope the negative of this is there somewhere but they were tiny in those days and i had a lot of them. only worth checking further if this is something. i know it would be easy to fake the image i have, but honestly, i could do it better if i wanted to. i've attached three pics. one is a scanned image of the photo. two is a cleaned up image of the original (just getting rid of some grain). the third is a screen grab of the google street view of the area today. it's changed a bit now (holiday there a couple of years ago too) but you can kind of get a bearing for where it would be and how weird it is to have anything out there. anyway, hope to hear back from you. this has taken an hour.
content.summary: Hovering near cliff - seen by many - long time ago

content.detailedDescription: My family and i were heading north on i-5 in national city ca when my wife ask, what was that? i saw about five glowing balls in between orange and yellow. i saw them for only 3 sec because i was driving and the buildings and trees were getting in the way but i'm sure this were no helicopters like she thought and no stars. from what i saw it seem they were in a stand still and spread out.  they were at least 50 miles away and maybe half a mile away from each other. i wish i could have been in a place were i could have seen them better and observe them longer.
content.summary: 5 glowing fireballs like spread around above the horizon.

content.detailedDescription: Watched craft flying at low altitude with bright lights flashing at length of object. could not make outline but between lights stars were blaçked out. no sound or no trail. thought it was 2 military jets flying in unison but discovered it was just one unit. holding up arms and hands for measurements would estimate from where i was hands were 2-3 ft across. silently continued a northerly course until i could not see further. looked thru binoculors but could not make out details as it was too dark. wish to remain anonymous at this time until/ if çontacted.
content.summary: Observed lights flashing on each end of craft at very low altitude. holding up arms to measure was 2 -3ft

content.detailedDescription: My brother came running in to tell me he thought a plane was on fire in the sky. thats how bright it was. no blinking lights either just bright fire color with a glow as you see in the pics. they were going really fast, at first i thought the first one was a commet but there was no tail and it just stopped in mid air then it started going again and poof gone. saw 7 total one would disappear and then another one would show up and so on. weirdest thing i ever saw.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Looked like a plane on fire hovered then started going again and poof it was gone. then saw 6 more one after the other

content.detailedDescription: Three lights moving in formation from west to east, speed was incredible from my visible horizon lines within seconds at a completely consistent speeds though the distance between the lights changed as the passed overhead< meaning they briefly spread farther apart from one another noticeably for a time before then reassuming the original formation i had seen them in, despite the lights changing there, from my vantage point, lateral symmetry, all of the lights seemed to maintain the exact same speed in a slightly boomerang pattern, shifting to a straight line. no noise whatsoever, and no exhaust or plumes of smoke or evidence of exhaust. absolutely no cloud cover at all, and no planes noticed going overhead until at least 1-1 1/2 hours after the sighting. there is one other witness to this event who will agree with the events as described above, though we seem to disagree on what we perceived as the colors of the the lights. i seem to think they had a redish/amberish tone yet she maintains a bright bluish tone. she also states that she saw the lights move in a slower more wandering/floating formation before she alerted me to seeing them, and that's when they began to move from west to east...Lights appeared solid, meaning that regardless of there distance or perspective, the illumination appeared consistent and contained; they appeared constantly spherical and though the definatly eminated light, they didnt apear to cast it at all. there was no visible structure between the lights, and i at times i could see the stars above passing between the lights. as stated above there was another witness to this event who saw some other activity/odd formations briefly before this main event and we both seem to disagree on the color of the lights but agree on everything else entirely...The discrepincy in what we percieve the color of the light being is bothersome: i saw red, she saw blue.
content.summary: Three lights flying in formation, incredible speed, manitoba june 2015

content.detailedDescription: While trying to fall asleep, looking out my window, i saw three orbs that made a shape of a triangle. bright red/orange lights. total size was about larger than a 3,000sq house. i yelled at my girlfriend to wake her up. she woke up mad that i was loud and woke her. i told her look out the window!! we both sat there watching it wondering what it was. the craft hovered closer to our complex, then in a downward swooping motion, landed. the lights disappeared and i could not see any craft. like as if it went inside the earth without breaking ground.. she saw it and she does not believe in ufo's nor et life. but she has changed her outlook since.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Very large craft ascension.

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i decided while we where traveling to california from florida in the early 1990s to go to joshua tree. i had heard a story that there was a man years before who believed he was in contact with aliens that lived in a giant rock. we decided to park the truck right next to the giant rock, sit on the tail gate and spend the night looking for ufo`s. as luck would have it, some time near 11pm to 12am an extremely bright orange glowing ball of light ascended from behind the mountain that we where looking towards. i remember feeling excitement that we where seeing a ufo. but at the same time i thought it is probably man made.  it was so bright it lit up the whole side of the mountain. it must have been visible from many miles away. we had no idea what it was. we ruled out airplanes, blimps and helicopters. the object emanated orange light from all sides. so it was not a spotlight. the orange glow never wavered. our distance from the mountain was hard to tell. if i where to guess i would say anywhere from 5 to 15 miles. the object hovered just above the mountain for at least 15 to 20 minutes. then all of the sudden two fighter jets came from behind us towards the object. as the fighter jets got close to it the object descended back down behind the mountain. the fighter jets then flew off. after a short period of time the orange glowing ball ascended back up from behind the mountain. it hovered for a while but once again the fighter jets came from behind us flying toward the object and the object descended back down behind the mountain. the object once again ascended back up a short time later but once again the fighter jets where back. this happened at least 4 times. the last time the object ascended from behind the mountain it started to ascend and fly to our right at a slow speed. we watched it until it was to high and far for us to see. the object made no noise. my friend took many photos of it but his camera went missing. at the time i thought this must be a common occurrence out here. i assumed this orange glowing sphere must be seen all the time.
content.summary: Friend  and i saw an extremely bright orange glowing ufo while camping at joshua tree in california in early 1990s

content.detailedDescription:
I was cooking hot dogs on my grill facing east-ish. i looked up to and saw the planet alignment to the north and the to the little(?) dipper and over the houses to the east i saw the bright orange flickering sphere heading towards me, it seemed. i believe it was coming towards me and then turned to cross in front of me. i ran in the house, got my cell phone and snapped three pictures.

i tried to turn on my video instead of stills, but that crashed my camera app. i tried twice, gave up and snapped more stills as it flew out of site.
content.summary: Orange flickering sphere fly-by

content.detailedDescription: My two friends and i were walking down the hill, the hill is called red hill and it sits right in the middle of the idaho state campus. it's a pretty popular place for people to visit. it was roughly 11pm, we were coming down the hill and my one friend looked up and noticed a strange object in the sky right over the hill, she pointed it out and asked us if we were seeing the object as well, we both said yes. the object was reflective, almost see-through. when we noticed it, it was hovering and then immediately took off at an astonishingly high speed, but with no sound. it took off nw. the three of us couldn't believe what we had seen. we were speechless. i was kind of shaken up. to this day i still can see the object just as if it happened yesterday.
content.summary: It was clear-ish as if it had reflective paneling.

content.detailedDescription: Was outside with dogs, and is my habit, i was watching the sky. noticed a craft coming from nnw and passing directly overhead. first thing that occurred to me was that there were no anti-collision lights or strobe. there were 3 steady white lights on the corners and a steady red light centered below.  hard to estimate elevation and speed as it was clear with no clouds visible. was only in view for about 3-4 seconds before disappearing over the trees to the south. absolutely no sound!
content.summary: Large, silent, speedy triangular craft passed directly overhead

content.detailedDescription: I work for a construction company and was on my lunch break on 06/09/15.  i had noticed a large home being constructed about a half a mile away or so and thought i should take a picture to bring home and show my family.  once you see the size of the home you'll understand why something so simple caught my attention.  my boss claims the house is around 25,000 square feet so it's not your average home by any stretch.   since i had a few minutes to kill i took out my cell phone and snapped a picture of the home.  i use a samsung galaxy s4 phone and considering the distance i had to zoom my camera to its maximum zoom of 4x.  after snapping the picture i immediately looked to see how it turned out and saw it was a little blurry.  i immediately opened my camera again to snap a second picture taking care to hold my hand more steady the second time.  i understand with full zoom on a digital camera the slightest shake can blur the image so i was being careful.  approximately 15-20 seconds elapsed between the two pictures.  i'm hoping the time stamp information will be uploaded with the images but i'm not that technical so i don't know for sure if it will.  i have the information if it does not.  anyway, i glanced at the picture and saw that the quality was much better and would be sufficient for me to show my family the giant house i'd been talking about.  i closed my camera app and went on with my work day.  that evening i was showing both images to my brother when i noticed something strange in the second, more clear image.  i used the zoom capability of my phone to zoom in on the object and that is why i'm contacting you now.  i have no explanation for what the object in the image is nor do i have the slightest idea where it came from.  i went back and checked the first image and there is nothing apparent in the sky aside from a few clouds.  the object doesn't appear to be anywhere near high enough to have been obscured by clouds.  also it struck me as odd that given the very short duration of time between the images that any object could have traveled that far across the frame that quickly.  it just doesn't seem possible to me but then again, to the naked eye, i didn't notice anything in the sky at all while taking either picture.  i don't know the exact amount of time between images but i do know that both time stamps say 12:10pm.  so i do know that i was less that 60 seconds either way.  i have no idea what the image is and had no response to it being as i didn't notice it until long after the fact.  i have zoomed in and looked as closely as i can and it definitely isn't a bird.  from the distance the photo was taken it would have been a huge bird in my opinion.  also the shape doesn't resemble a living creature in any way.  my gut told me it had to be an airplane but again the shape appears to be all wrong.  i also would have thought it would have been visible in the first picture and it definitely isn't.   i'm not sure what could travel that far, that fast.  my hope is that your experts can enhance the image and clear this up for me.  it is a ufo in the fact that i have no idea what it is or where it came from.   i can't with any certainty claim it to be alien either.  that's why i'm handing it over to the experts.  i hope this is enough information for you to work with and i look forward to hearing from you.  thank you for your time.
content.summary: Two photos taken back to back...Object appeared

content.detailedDescription:
I walked outside the front door of our house, which faces north, at around 9:30 am mountain time to sip my morning coffee and smoke a cigarette.  i recall the sky was blue without a cloud in the sky.  we had gone through a period of extended rainfall and grey skies and recall noting how nice it was to see the sky was blue without a cloud in sight.  approximately 2-3 miles north of our house is a small airport that regularly flies planes over the airport and drops parachute jumpers.  i enjoy watching them jump out of the plane, open their shoots and watch them fall to the ground in the open fields near the airport.  we do experience quite a bit of air traffic as a result of the airport.  the planes that fly over are mostly small single engine propeller airplanes and some biplanes.  the planes that take the parachute jumpers up are slightly bigger with two propellers.  

this particular morning, as i stepped outside i saw the parachute jumpers jumping out of the plane and open their shoots.  as i was looking up at the parachute jumpers, beyond them in the sky, i saw 7-8 round metallic looking objects (i did not count them) in the sky flying in what appeared to be in some sort of formation with 3-4 objects flying in-front and 3-4 following behind flying in a manner that seemed like they were flying around each other in a counter clockwise fashion.  they must of been a significant distance away, but i honestly have no clue as to the distance.  initially i thought they were airplanes flying in formation, maybe even engaging in some sort of exercise or dog fighting simulation.  i remember also thinking to myself, "are the parachute jumpers seeing this?".  i have lived in this house for 3 years and i have never witnessed any kind of flight activity from the airport such as this.  i thought maybe it was a military exercise, but aside from an occasional chinook helicopter i have never seen any significant military activity in the area, nor am i aware of any.  as the objects moved in the sky, i distinctly remember seeing the objects reflect the sunlight in the east.  i tried to picture in my head what if anything these objects resembled. i was mostly running through different planes they might be but couldn't figure it out.  i continued to watch them curiously for maybe two minutes as they continued to circle around each other slowly moving eastward.  they didn't seem to move too erratically with maybe the exception of the sharp turns they seemed to do around each other.  then my girlfriend stepped outside to water the plants.  i brought her attention to the objects in the sky.  she looked for a moment and immediately said, "ufos!".  that's when the thought that what i might be seeing is some sort of ufo.  in a sense it was, i saw an unidentified flying object, whether or not it's of earthly origin or not, i do not know.  what i can say is, i have never seen anything like it before and found it curious and interesting.  

my girlfriend and i continued to watch the objects for about another minute as it slowly drifted eastward while they continued to circle another and they just slowly moved out of view on the horizon.  they did not dart off, they just slowly dissipated into the sky, presumably as they moved too far away to remain in our line of sight.  afterwards, we kind of looked at each other perplexed, not quite sure what we had seen.  we didn't dwell on it heavily and somewhat dismissed it as we went on with our day getting ready for a camping trip to rocky mountain national park we had planned.  in subsequent days though, what we saw kept coming up in our conversations and we thought it would be a good idea to put in a report and see if anyone else saw something too.
content.summary: Multiple objects seen flying in formation north of longmont, co.

content.detailedDescription:
June 10 2015 @ 4:49am i was pulling into the backside of my apartment complex to park my car ( towards the east direction) the sky was black with no clouds visible; cedar trees directly in front of me and the moon was waning cresant shape to the south east direction further way from my vision.  at first i thought was a falling orange object from the north east direction, like brighter than a falling star, because all i saw was a bright orange color to the left of my vantage point and as it got closer to me, i thought it was a big flying toy! then i immediately jumped out of my car not parking it. the flying object was traveling fast now directly in front & above me never slowing down. at that point i did not think it was a toy flying object anymore!  i saw the outline of it and appeared black or dark. several orange lights in front and back of the dark flying object. and i do not think they were blinking lights more like solid. it was quickly moving in the direction of south west & disappearing over a 2 story apartment building.  i ran quickly to follow the lights and they just disappeared.  the shape of the fast moving flying object was skinny appearing or bullet like or missle shape. it did not appear round or circular shape and appeared flat more like than round, yet was right in front & above my vision clearly; lower than clouds would have been and higher than the trees and higher than the 2 story building & moved fast. i had fear it was crashing as it went over 2story apartment building. 
my feelings were of awe and excitement; i almost called the police to report what i witnessed yet i thought that they would think i was crazy.  i stood outside looking all around the sky until 5:40 am and never saw it against. i kept going over in my mind what i saw and i wrote down immediately what i saw.  i still have clear memory of what i witnessed. was not a plane or a jet. there was no noise and no smoke left behind.  i am now wondering why the universe allowed me to witness this now; i do not believe in coincidences. i have never saw anything like this in my life. i watch the stars and planets weekly for several years of my life since i was a young child.  i lost sight because it disappeared over a 2 story apartment building yet i ran quickly to keep watching it and all the several orange lights @ the fast moving flying object completely disappeared from my vision.  was not in the same direction of the dfw airport fight pattern and did not look like a military jet or plane or helicopter.
content.summary: Saw bright orange light to my left north east; traveled fast & was directly in front & above me; several orange lights in the front & back; skinny large long shaped fast flying object; disappeared quickly to south west direction

content.detailedDescription: Was at dollar general on hwy 49 in richfeild, saw flash of light observed object metallic in color emmiting flashs i grabbed camera and took 4 pictures. changed shapes then flashed and dissapeard. please contact me i have picturesbut unable tosend them through this file attachment.
content.summary: Saw flash, metallic object changing shapes hovering

content.detailedDescription:
Probably not a ufo
one afternoon in late august 1961 i was flying as ecm and radar operator aboard a navy radar constellation out over the atlantic on the north atlantic barrier.  we were returning from a barrier run from argentia, newfoundland, to the azores and return and were a couple hours east of argentia.  

the bmews radar at thule was wiping out all the potential ecm targets so i was checking out the aps 45 height finder radar.  the radar was operating as expected when i noticed a fast moving target at 90,000 feet heading west.  i called the chief air control operator who tagged this bogey going 1800 mph a hundred miles south of us heading about 250 degrees.  his position was about 40 west and 40 north.  this would be from anywhere europe to the central us coast.  this was reported to norad and acknowledged.

since then i have tried to find out what this bird was.  the a-1 was in development and its successor the sr-71 was a couple years later.  the b-45 and the vigilante did not fly this high or fast so far as i know.  i asked wright-patterson air museum and the national aerospace museum with no reply.  do you have any idea what it was?  i bet it was one of our planes from the skunk works but i find nothing in the literature in 1961.
content.summary: Probably not a ufo one afternoon in late august 1961 i was flying as ecm and radar operator aboard a navy radar constellation out over the atlantic on the north atlantic barrier.  we were returning from a barrier run from argentia, newfoundland, to the az

content.detailedDescription: on may 25th, 2015 at approximately 9:45-10:00 pm was driving north on county rd. 6 east between cnty. rd. 2 north and 3 north near monte vista, colorado.  was looking west at jupiter about 45 degrees up.  a few faint stars were  shining.  alternating between looking at the road and looking west.  on one glance there was a bright light about the size of jupiter but a little brighter about a hands span at arms length to the south and a little lower in the sky than jupiter. could not tell distance or altitude looked back forward and then back and it was gone.  it didn't move, just stationary. i was surprised and excited.  i had seen similar in feb. of 2014, often 2-3 close together, sometimes moving but usually stationary.  stayed there for about 4 seconds.  when i told my wife about it she said that she saw it too out a north window of the house and it was moving north. i saw it again out that same widow on the 26th about the same time of night.  it wasn't moving and by the time i could bring my binoculars to bear on it it was gone. went outside to look but it didn't appear again. no planes were visible anywhere in the northern sky.  it was there for a few seconds and then went out.  could not tell distance or altitude.  saw the same type of blue white lights for a period of 7 days last february but was unable to get them on film due to the short duration of the sightings, always just 4 or 5 seconds long.
content.summary: Very bright light like the size and shape of jupiter in the night sky appeared for 4 sec. and went out, stationary

content.detailedDescription: Last night joel and i were sitting on my deck in back yard say 11 clock all of a sudden he says what the hell is that i said what over to my left behind me i look big round orange red pulsating like glowing in and out to me it look as if it came off mccord air force base runway cause it look like it was coming right torwards us then u turn back towards the base right after that what look like starsmove from over top of the base came and hover obove my place for rest of night i put spot light on it it moved closer to us then spot shined it on another one i thought was a star it didn't like that and took off like a bad out of hell we stayed out till 3am and saw a total of 5 ufo but they all were just bright white ones that look like stars my vicki saw it and joel anita saw them i see the one that look like star all the time and never here reports of them at all joel sees them at his place in spanaway to the main one we saw got behind  a oak tree but look like it was heading back mccord air force base i think that one was ours cause all the other ones that started moving around when that one ufo they acted concerned about it i think they wanted it back i should of went got my camera video it but its a normal thing here nobody thinks any thing of it
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Look like came from mchord air force air port u turn head right back

content.detailedDescription:
I was bringing the trash bins down the driveway with my 4 year old grandson. the sky was totally clear, so we started looking at stars.  as we turned toward the west, we saw four red lights in an elongated triangular pattern, hanging motionless in the sky, possibly over the gulf of mexico.  i had no idea what it could be, but i knew it couldn't be a plane or helicopter.  i thought, could this be a ufo?!?  i couldn't believe it.  i just kept staring at the lights, trying to figure out what they could be.  after about fifteen minutes, one by one, the lights began to fade out until they disappeared.   i sent my grandson into the house to get my wife but he obviously didn't express the need for speed, because by the time she came out, all she saw was one light for a few seconds before it went out.    

for the next few days i searched the internet for similar reports but found nothing.  today my wife said to me, are you gonna call mufon, or what? so here we are. :-).  i've never seen anything like that before.  i wish i'd seen more.
content.summary: I saw 4 red lights in an elongated triangle pattern in the sky, possibly above the gulf of mexico.

content.detailedDescription: I saw the lights in the sky when travelling in my car. i stopped and took the pictures with my samsung s5. the objects faded in around 3-4 mins.
content.summary: See below.

content.detailedDescription: I wrote a letter to a actress's do actors  than a blue dot points to that letter i look out a window and inslide a some kinda building i see a ufo part of that building it was inslide that building and coming out of it it was white disk shape. the later it's gone
content.summary: Ufo white was in building some what a bit

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 11:05 pm est, while sitting in my back yard at the fire, a very bright red diamond shaped light in the eastern sky caught my attention. at first i thought it was the  landing light to an air craft and was waiting for it to roar over head. but after it cleared my neighbors tree, it was apparent that this object was at a high altitude. it made no sound. at about 10 second intervals, the object was emitting what looked like sparks or small balls of light that would last only about a half second. these emissions left no trail behind it. i went in the house and got my wife and son who came outside and also witnessed what was happening. i then went back into the house to get a camera. i came out of the front door which faces west and the object wasn't there. i went to the back of the house where my wife was still watching in. she pointed that it was heading towards the north and was above a narrow strip of clouds that i estimate to be at about 3,000 feet. by then it was out of view. but we saw the cloud light up twice as the object was still emitting its sparks. after that, we could no longer see it. 
i made the observation and confirmed it with the weather channel that the band of clouds in my area were moving south east, yet this object was traveling north west. i have ruled out any sort of balloon or chinese lantern that could do this.
 the size, (about twice the size of the north star) brightness and slower speed made me think that it was in our atmosphere.
content.summary: Bright red diamond shaped object emitting fire balls or sparks at high altitude.

content.detailedDescription:
Hello. back in october 2013 (we've been very lazy in reporting this),  my husband and i went on our honeymoon to "the cuddle shack" in the mountains of gatlinburg, tn (the shack does not have an actual address, but this site shows exactly on the map where it is: [link moved to fi section/cms/tg]). here, over the course of several nights (october 6-9, '13), we saw several unidentified aerial phenomena. 

first, on sunday night, the 6th, out over the valley to the south (in our direct line of sight from the deck of the shack), there appeared to be, to the naked eye, a stationary object, like a super-bright twinkling star (which didn't make sense as we could see the mountain was behind it). when i looked through our binoculars, the object looked like a diamond and flashed super-bright rainbow colors. soon after that, a smaller object, which appeared to be a strobe of white light, came in from the left (east) and slowly circled the larger object. over the course of the next three nights (up to and including the 9th), i noticed these objects together several more times. 

the remainder of the sightings occurred all in the same general area: a patch of sky in the gap between two huge trees right next to, on the west side of, our shack.

on monday the 7th, the first ufo event of that evening lasted no more than two seconds, and really surprised me. in the space of about two seconds, i noticed a little white light; that light grew really big into a sort of cone or wedge shape; and then the light shot off (like warp drive or hyperspace) into an "arc" at a 45-degree angle up.

about an hour later (still on the 7th), my husband and i were sitting on the deck when i noticed a set of what appeared to be two round, bright white lights going really fast from south to north. first there was one, but when it was about 2/3 - 3/4 way through the gap, the second one appeared, slightly lower.  ten minutes after that, a second set of similar-looking objects, in a similar configuration, went by along the same path, but this time i grabbed my binoculars and was able to make out the shape of one of these objects: it appeared to have the shape of that of a "rounded arrow" or a guitar pick, with the "point" in the front, like this: " (> ".  the entire rounded arrow was brilliantly lit.

finally, on the 9th, while my husband was in the bathroom, i noticed that the more northern-more of the two trees was "lit up"; a white light was mysteriously shining on the back, left top branches of the tree. i heard no sound. i determined that the source of the light must have been coming from somewhere behind the more southern tree, though how, i have no idea.  there is no ground, as the mountain slopes down at that point; and, if it were a helicopter, i surely would've heard it as well as saw/felt the wind from the blades.

it might also be worth noting here that, on the 8th, at about 1:00 in the morning, i said to my husband, half-jokingly/half-seriously, that i should try to bang on a tree with a stick and do "bigfoot calls", since we were in the wilderness. i climbed down and did tree knocking with a branch i found, and, to our shock, somewhere from the distance, there was a return "whoop"!!!  the next morning we looked up bigfoot sightings in the area and it turns out we were smack dab in the middle of their migratory season for that area.
content.summary: Multiple kinds of ufos over the course of a few nights

content.detailedDescription:
I live on the 35th floor in downtown manhattan. around 10:30pm was watching tv when i turned and saw what i originally thought would be a blimp with advertising as is usually seen. instead i saw a strange object on the hudson river (how long it had been there i don't know because i was not facing my terrace window). it was bugging me that i couldn't figure out what it was so i grabbed my binoculars and went out on the terrace.  what originally looked round was now a saucer - a flat-like disc and i could only see the underside but it was slim.  it was proceeding slowly toward the empire state building and taking its time as if on a sight-seeing trip.  no other passenger planes were in the area but it appears that a couple of very small planes passed by but at a higher altitude.  i expected a lot of activity once the city realized what they were seeing but nothing untoward occurred.  the entire thing was lit up brightly and i could see things like doors or outlines of doors on the underside. it had lights and a large red flashing light was the most prominent. i would say it was probably the size of a passenger plane but circular. watched for over a half hour and when it went on a straight path toward the 59th street bridge and the east river. i thought it was heading toward laguardia or jfk airport but it passed out over into long island. the last i observed it, it was a small dot wayout there. i thought for sure
the towers at kennedy would pick it up.  when i woke this morning, there was no news of a sighting on tv. i've lived here for 35 years and have never witnessed an object like that before.  how can something like that pass over a city the size of new york and nobody else saw it?  it baffles the mind.
content.summary: Looked round. when observed through binoculars realized shape was saucer.
